pr_title: [TE] add enpoints to save dimension filter for RCA v2 POC

+package org.apache.pinot.thirdeye.dashboard.resources.v2.rootcause;
+
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
+import java.io.Serializable;
+
+@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
+public abstract class AbstractRCAModuleConfig implements Serializable {

timeline.bodyText: Will it work if the type is defined as List<AbstractRCAModuleConfig>? it should automatically convert it into Json when saving?
timeline.author: jihaozh

replies.bodyText: The reason I use Map<String, Object> is that this map includes more than justAbstractRCAModuleConfig. Once we start working on modularizing RCA components, this map should include class names for modules and corrsponding configurations.
replies.author: vincentchenjl

timeline.message: [TE] add enpoints to save dimension filter for RCA v2 POC
